categories: Category:Solo: A Star Wars Story actors

nodes.text: Alden Ehrenreich (born November 22, 1989) is an American actor who played Han Solo in Solo: A Star Wars Story. He is signed to play the character in two more films.

In an interview with The Big Event podcast, Alden Ehrenreich talked about using Wookieepedia to research for his upcoming role as Han Solo, taking note of several articles including Jizz, Bureau of Ships and Services, and the instruction manual for the Millennium Falcon, among others.
